info.name: Kroger OAuth Token
info.description:
Exchange Kroger authorization code for access_token and refresh_token.

1. Get authorize URL: run `node skills/kroger/oauth-helper.js --postman` (with KROGER_CLIENT_ID and KROGER_CLIENT_SECRET in .env).
2. Open that URL in a browser, log in with Kroger, approve. You'll be redirected to your callback URL with ?code=...
3. Copy the `code` from the redirect URL.
4. In this collection, set variables: client_id, client_secret, redirect_uri (must match Kroger app), and paste the code into the request body.
5. Send the request. Copy refresh_token from the response into ~/.clawdbot/.env as KROGER_REFRESH_TOKEN=...

request.description: Set collection variables: client_id, client_secret, redirect_uri (must match Kroger app), code (paste from redirect URL after login).
